name: Sculpteo
description: Makers of Awards-winning 3D printing products and services. Home of http://t.co/b5uF23ly. We 3D print for you at http://t.co/ZNHGUzhr

apis.name: Sculpteo
apis.description: Sculpteo is an online 3D printing service. Users upload a 3D printed model and Sculpteo ships a 3D object. Sculpteo supports files from most 3D modeling softwares and keeps shapes, colors, and textures as designed. Objects are available in a variety of materials.nThe Sculpteo API provides developer access to Sculpteo functionality through HTTP POST calls. Supported processes include uploading files and ordering designs. Responses and progress tracking are JSON formatted.
